title: @KateyKhaos or SOMEONE. Please fix Yasuo's missing particles. It has been far too long.
body:
Yasuo has been missing some really good looking particles for a long time now, and people over on r/YasuoMains are relying on third parties to add the particles back. I don't think this is acceptable and it should be fixed as soon as possible.

What are the missing particles you may ask?

[Here is an example of Yasuo without the particles.](https://i.imgur.com/NN1uTmL.png) This is when Yasuo uses Sweeping Blade and then Steel Tempest to strike in a circle.

[Here is Yasuo's E+Q combo with the missing particles.](https://i.imgur.com/GV2gKvT.png)

As you can see, there is an additional blue streak that appears while you are casting your E+Q combination. It may not look so impressive in a still shot, but the missing particles look absolutely beautiful. I'll post a comparison video (by another person) at the end of this post.

His E+Q isn't the only particle set missing. His regular Tornado also used to have particles when they hit enemies. 

[Here is Yasuo's Tornado hitting an enemy without particles.](https://i.imgur.com/zjk9OVN.png)

[And then here is Yasuo hitting enemies WITH the particles.](https://i.imgur.com/Dz04Edi.png)

The windy swirl that wraps around your target is missing as well.


[Here is a video comparing the two. The first half of the video has the missing particles, the second half does not.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=llYmirIG1eU)

Please fix this issue, these particles are absolutely beautiful and it's simply a waste and a shame to not have them present on Yasuo.

**Also, keep in mind that High Noon Yasuo also has missing particles of a similar nature.** 
I believe they are the same particles, just recolored to match High Noon's theme.

Thank you for your time.

Full disclosure, I'm on Skins, so stuff that's pertaining to updates of the base champion (VFX, anims, etc.) are out of my wheelhouse and I don't wanna speak for the Champions/Live Gameplay teams.

I wouldn't say that any particular team dislikes Katarina. She received some love in 2016 with the Assassin's update. In terms of skins themselves, she receives them pretty consistently, her last skin being in 2017 (and a Warring Kingdoms chroma earlier this year). 

Jumping off of that, since there isn't an update pending, she's still eligible for skins. Katarina, imo, is a bit tricky in terms of a legendary because her animations are super quick, so we weigh in with things like 'well how noticeable is this if we change it, what needs to be done to make it feel better/different?' and she (like most assassins), naturally lack piles of VFX when compared to someone like Lux, for example. *But*, she does have cool moments like Death Lotus or Preparation that I think could really be played up, especially when talking about a thematic like Star Guardian. Plus, legendary skins means new VO, which could be a lot of fun! 

Now for the bad news - like all other champions, I can't give you much more info than that she's eligible for a skin. I can't spill the beans on whether or not she has something in the works. (Even if I could, I wouldn't wanna ruin the surprise!)
